Hack.help: You perform a tough slashing attack with your blade, causing lethal damage. This attack will also reduce the defenses of your target and has a chance to land a critical strike, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
Hack.shortHelp: Melee, Moderate DMG(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Slash.help: You perform a quick slashing attack with your blade, causing lethal damage. This attack will also reduce the target's defenses and has a small chance for a critical strike, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
Slash.shortHelp: Melee, Minor DMG(Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Shuriken.help: A classic small throwing weapon, you can throw Shurikens at a pretty fast fire rate. You must be level 44 and have Web Grenade or Caltrops before selecting this power. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

Assassins_Blade.help: You impale your foe on your blade, causing lethal damage. There is a chance that this attack will be a critical hit, causing additional lethal damage. If hidden, this critical strike chance is guaranteed.
Assassins_Blade.shortHelp: Melee, Superior DMG (Lethal), Chance for Critical DMG (Lethal)

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Placate.help: You placate a foe, convincing them to break off their attacks on you. If successful, you will also be hidden from your foes. This stealth effect is very brief and offers no defense bonuses, but it will allow you to set up an attack for a critical strike. If you attack a placated foe, the effect will break, allowing the foe to attack you once more.

Head_Splitter.help: You perform a devastating Golden Dragonfly attack that deals a massive amount of lethal damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce their Defense. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. If executed while hidden, only some affected targets may be hit with a Critical, however, there is a chance you may land a Critical hit with Golden Dragonfly even if you are not Hidden. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.shortHelp: Melee, Extreme DMG (Lethal), -DEF (Foe, All), Chance for Knockdown (Foe)
Head_Splitter.targetHelp: The Ninja Blade has reduced your Defenses.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage [CRITICAL].

Hide.help: You utilize masterful stealth techniques to become almost impossible to detect. When properly hidden, you can pull off critical hits with your attacks. If you attack or are damaged while hidden, the effect will break and you will be unable to set up guaranteed critical strikes, though you will retain your defense bonuses for a short while.

Dark_Regeneration.help: You tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life through negative energy damage from all enemies nearby, healing yourself in the process. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Cloak_of_Fear.help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, with a reduced chance to hit. Recharge: Fast
